venue.name: Roots and Wings Yoga and Healing ArtsCenter

item.description:
Tonight we'll have more opportunity to get to know each other and have some fun, while learning about and exercising our allowing skills at the same time! 

After some ice-breaker and get-to-know activity, our plan is to play some fun team games like pictionary and/or guesstures.  You know, silly ones in which letting go is what allows you to have fun and succeed.

Have any other suggestions for team games?  I'd really like us to play pictionary, since playing this at a friend's house is what gave us this idea. 

If you find yourself having some kind of inner "story" or narrative about this and being too shy or not good enough or something similar, then all the more reason to come and learn how to let go! We did this with improv comedy last year and it was really awesome for everyone.  Lots of fun and lots of learning that will relate to allowing your desires to manifest.  And, the opportunity to make some LoA friends!  What could be better?

Please bring a snack to share. (There's a microwave and sink there, but no kitchen or utensils, etc.)

Any questions or ideas, etc., please e-mail me at annide@newpossibiltiescoaching.com.

Please be considerate and honor your "yes" rsvp and either show up or let us know if your plans change by changing your rsvp. Many of you have been wonderful about this, and we very much appreciate your understanding, consideration and support!  Thank you!

Can't wait to play with you!

Ann and Mark
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the Wings studio on the first floor

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Exercise Your "Allowing Muscles" through Fun and Games!
